messages.title: The positive choice
messages.content: James says: 'Everyone agrees – this General Election is a chance to change direction in Brecon and Radnorshire. Electing a Liberal Democrat MP will send a clear message to the Government that we want to be heard.'

messages.title: James Gibson Watt
messages.content: A local voice in Parliament, a strong community campaigner with a proven track record.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promote growth in the local community and ensure that young and talented individuals remain in the area.
Ensure the NHS receives the funding it needs to protect and improve services.
James Gibson Watt will oppose the cuts and stand up for your family's income and your rights.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Brecon and Radnorshire it's a clear choice: IT'S LIB DEM OR CONSERVATIVES HERE

issues.brexitEurope: James will fight for us to remain in Europe, retain our strength and benefit from free trade deals. He’ll work to protect jobs and stand up for the 80,000 jobs at risk in Wales if we left the Single Market.
issues.socialWelfare: Will fight the cuts that the Conservatives inflict in welfare that put the most vulnerable at risk.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ve grown up in an open, tolerant and outward looking community. I want future generations to grow up in the same way.

politicalExperience.achievements: James Gibson-Watt is the most choice to be the new MP for Brecon and Radnorshire.

quotes.text: James will fight for us to remain in Europe, retain our strength and benefit from free trade deals. He’ll work to protect jobs and stand up for the 80,000 jobs at risk in Wales if we left the Single Market.
